articles.author: Tanishq Vaddi
articles.title: Australia vs Bangladesh Live Score, World Cup 2023: Towhid Hridoy departs after scoring 74, BAN six down - The Indian Express
articles.description: AUS vs BAN Live Score, World Cup 2023: Australia will be looking to maintain their winning momentum ahead of the knockout stages when they will face Bangladesh on Saturday.
articles.content: Glenn Maxwell couldn’t move his feet. Such was the pain that he couldn’t put weight on his front foot. The back leg was also fragile. Every time there was an instinctive pressure on the legs, cramps … [+790 chars]
